sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './settings.css'; function Settings() { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false); const [selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState('default'); useEffect(() => { if (isDarkMode) { document.querySelector('html').classList.add('dark-mode'); } else { document.querySelector('html').classList.remove('dark-mode'); } }, [isDarkMode]); const handleToggleDarkMode = () => { setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode); }; const handleColorChange = async (event) => { const newColor = event.target.value; setSelectedColor(newColor); try { await axios.put(`http://localhost:3000/priorities/color/${newColor}`); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; return (

); } export default Settings;
